mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room(roomNum, roomName, roomReg_date, roomContent, roomPeople, roomMax_people, rcNum, roomSeasonPrice, roomWd_price, roomWe_price, mhId, roomOption, roomBed, enabled) VALUES (#{roomNum}, #{roomName}, SYSDATE, #{roomContent}, #{roomPeople}, #{roomMax_people}, #{rcNum}, #{roomSeasonPrice}, #{roomWd_price}, #{roomWe_price}, #{mhId}, #{roomOption}, #{roomBed}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT roomNum, roomName, roomReg_date, roomContent, roomPeople, roomMax_people, rcNum, roomSeasonPrice, roomWd_price, roomWe_price, mhId, roomOption, roomBed, enabled FROM room WHERE roomNum = #{roomNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO roomPhoto(rPhotoNum, rPhotoName, roomNum) VALUES (roomPhoto_seq.NEXTVAL, #{rPhotoName}, #{roomNum})
mapper.select: SELECT rcName FROM roomCategory WHERE rcNum = #{rcNum}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM room WHERE mhId=#{mhId} AND enabled!=2
AND enabled=0
AND enabled=1
mapper.delete: UPDATE room SET enabled=2 WHERE roomNum=#{roomNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE room SET enabled=1 WHERE roomNum=#{roomNum}
UPDATE room SET enabled=0 WHERE roomNum=#{roomNum}
